thread.title: Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS spotted ahead of launch : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS spotted ahead of launch : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today

title: Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS spotted ahead of launch : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today
text:
Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS spotted ahead of launch IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 21, 2017 | Written by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 13:29 IST The new Baleno RS will go up against the Fiat Punto Abarth and Volkswagen Polo GTI in India. 
We had earlier reported , Maruti Suzuki will launch the Baleno RS in India on March 3. Now, ahead of its launch, images of the new Baleno RS have started to surface on the internet courtesy CarToq. The new images of the Baleno RS reveal the new car in bright red color scheme. 
The new Baleno RS will be Maruti's second launch for the year after the Ignis, which the company launched on January 13 for a base price of Rs 4.99 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi). Maruti had unveiled the Baleno RS at the Auto Expo 2016 along with the Ignis. Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS. (Photo: Cartoq) 
Design: 
As an RS, Maruti Suzuki will give the Baleno a more sporty and aggressive stance. Moreover, expect Maruti to give the Baleno RS added design elements to make it more appealing to the customers. In the front, the Baleno RS will come with bi-xenon projector headlamps and power-operated ORVMs. Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS. (Photo: Cartoq) 
Engine: 
The new Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS will come with a 1.0-litre, BoosterJet petrol engine that produces maximum power output of 100BHP and maximum torque of 150NM, mated to a five-speed manual transmission. 
Features: 
The new car from Maruti Suzuki will be a lot like the Baleno albeit some additional features. This includes an updated dashboard and SmartPlay infotainment system with integrated Apple CarPlay among others. Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS. (Photo: Cartoq) 
Dimensions: 
The new Baleno RS will come with a wheelbase of 2520mm and will be 1745mm in width, 3995mm in length, 1510mm in height and will have a fuel capacity of 37L. 
Competition: 
The new Baleno RS will go up against the Fiat Punto Abarth and Volkswagen Polo GTI in India. Maruti Suzuki Baleno RS. (Photo: Cartoq) 
Price: 
We expect the new Baleno RS to come for a price tag of Rs 8 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi)- Rs 12 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi).
